text: ControlShift - Software Engineer - www.controlshiftlabs.com - Brooklyn / REMOTE ControlShift Labs is hiring a software engineer to support the improvement and continued development of our product that millions of people have used to fight for change in their communities. You will own features from concept to deployment, help shape product strategy and push for technical excellence. We're excited about supporting a shift in how advocacy organizations are using the internet to organize -- and building tools that empower ordinary activists in extraordinary ways. We're pragmatic about tech but our current stack is Ruby/Rails, Postgres and host on AWS using Hashicorp toolset. Apply and read more here: https://controlshift.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk0y7l/
